channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Best in the World
channel.desc: Best in the World is the entertainment clip show that invites CBBC viewers to playalong at home with Guinness World Records. We showcase the greatest and wackiest record breakers in hilarious guessing games - can you forecast the winner, solve what just happened or guess how many times they need do the thing they need to do? Competitive mug carrying? Golf club chucking? We?ve got both! Sit down and enjoy.
